scheme_name: National Overseas Scholarship For Scheduled Caste Etc. Candidates
description: The National Overseas Scholarship for Scheduled Caste (SC) and other specified candidates provides financial assistance for pursuing master’s and Ph.D. programs abroad. The scheme aims to enable SC and other marginalized students to access world-class education opportunities.
key_features: Scholarships for master’s and Ph.D. programs abroad
Covers SC and other specified candidates (e.g., Denotified Tribes, Landless Labourers)
Implemented by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment

benefits.scholarship_amount: Up to USD 33,600 per year for tuition and living expenses
benefits.additional_support: Airfare, visa fees, and medical insurance

education_criteria: Students enrolled in master’s or Ph.D. programs abroad
Courses must be in recognized foreign universities
additional_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Castes, Denotified Tribes, or specified categories
Annual family income must not exceed Rs. 8 Lakhs
Minimum 60% marks in previous qualifying exam
institution_criteria: Recognized foreign universities ranked in top global rankings

eligible_courses_delhi: Master’s and Ph.D. programs in engineering, sciences, humanities, social sciences, etc.
Courses offered by recognized foreign universities

steps: Visit the National Overseas Scholarship portal
Register and fill out the application form
Submit application and attend interview (if required)
application_process.note: Apply as per annual scholarship notification

required_documents.note: To prove family income below Rs. 8 Lakhs

special_notes: Limited to master’s and Ph.D. programs abroad
Selection includes academic merit and interview
Scholarship duration: 3 years for master’s, 4 years for Ph.D.
